data.author: Jiraya
data.quote: A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: People who continue to put their lives on the line to defend their faith become heroes and continue to exist on in legend.

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: If you don’t like the hand that fate’s dealt you with, fight for a new one!

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become… as strong as they can be.

data.author: Sakura Haruno
data.quote: A smile is the easiest way out of a difficult situation.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

data.author: St. Jerome
data.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.

data.author: Helen Keller
data.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

data.author: Norman Vincent Peale
data.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.

data.author: Og Mandino
data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
data.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

data.author: Simone de Beauvoir
data.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

data.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
data.quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.

data.author: Arthur Ashe
data.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

data.author: Rabindranath Tagore
data.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

data.author: Thomas Jefferson
data.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.

data.author: Ralph Marston
data.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

data.author: Samuel Beckett
data.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
